abstract: Hiroshi “Mickey” Mikitani, the chief executive of Rakuten, said he would buy the rest of the social bookmarking site, if he could.
snippet: Hiroshi “Mickey” Mikitani, the chief executive of Rakuten, said he would buy the rest of the social bookmarking site, if he could.
lead_paragraph: SUN VALLEY, Idaho — Hiroshi “Mickey” Mikitani, the chief executive of Rakuten, would buy the rest of Pinterest — if he could.

headline.main: Pinterest on Wish List of Rakuten, Japan’s Amazon
